description: One of the eighteen Mahapuranas. Focuses on cosmology, geography, and pilgrimage sites. Also known as Adi Purana (the first Purana).
One of the eighteen Mahapuranas. Contains teachings on cosmology, dharma, and stories of various incarnations. Divided into six parts (amshas).
One of the eighteen Mahapuranas. Focuses on philosophy, cosmology, and various aspects of yoga and meditation practices.
